PUBLIC_ADDRESS.description: The address at which your bot can be reached. The public address of your Heroku app will be 'https://<App Name>.herokuapp.com

ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The bot's access token from Cisco Spark. Create a new bot account at https://developer.ciscospark.com/add-bot.html if you do not have one.

PORT.description: Port that the bot will run on

JIRA_HOST.description: The URL to your JIRA instance

JIRA_USERNAME.description: The username of the account to used to authenticate with JIRA. Changes made to JIRA will be performed by this user, so you may want to create a special bot account.

JIRA_PASSWORD.description: The password of the account to used to authenticate with JIRA.

JIRA_WEBHOOK_ROOM.description: The ID of the Spark room to post webhook updates to.
